title: Good
body: Love the colour and great for small hands

title: Vibrant and Reliable Controller for PS4
body: I recently picked up the Sony PlayStation DualShock 4 Controller in red, and I have to say, it's been a fantastic addition to my gaming setup. The color is absolutely stunning and really stands out among my other controllers. It's like a cherry on top of my gaming experience!Functionality-wise, this controller is a dream. The buttons and sticks feel responsive and durable, and I haven't experienced any lag or connection issues during my gaming sessions. The touchpad and the built-in speaker are a nice touch too – they add an extra layer of immersion to my games.The battery life is pretty decent, although I've found that it tends to drain a bit faster than my other DualShock 4 controllers. It's not a huge issue, though – just something to keep in mind if you're planning on having marathon gaming sessions. The controller charges quickly, so it's usually not a problem for me.The only real downside I can think of is the price. It's a bit on the expensive side, but I think the quality and performance more than justify it. Plus, the eye-catching red color makes it feel like a special edition or something, which is a nice bonus.Overall, I'm very happy with my purchase of the Sony PlayStation DualShock 4 Controller in red. It's a reliable and stylish controller that has added some extra excitement to my gaming experience. If you're in the market for a new controller, definitely consider picking this one up – you won't be disappointed!

title: Not working
body: We didn't use this controller frequently ,since we didn't have two player game . Now it seems like it's not charging .I thought it's problem with charger.. but no.the same charger is working well with other controller that I have with my PS4. This one doesn't work and I couldn't use. How do return this. ?

title: Brilliant
body: Don't waste your time with unofficial controllers. This is the best. Works exactly as designed. Top price = top quality

title: Works perfectly
body: Works perfectly, has a long battery life, wireless so can play from anywhere, with comfortable buttons and fits perfectly in the hand. Nice vibrant red colour too.

title: R1 not working properly
body: If i push the r1 button it stays in which is annoying and make it impossible to play, i get it in a bubble envelope without anything no cable just controller ripped off for money

title: Bad quality
body: D pad down button doesn't work and it has stick drift after not even a month of use. You expect better quality from an official product. I will be returning and not sure what to do about a replacement, can't even trust the official seller.

title: Good remote
body: not a lot to say. if you buy a playstation remote you expect good quality and this is just that. lovely feel and good response while playing

title: Ps4 controller
body: Came in perfect condition uncharged and not used before as should be the box and packaging were both undamaged and makes me feel better because the price was a little expensive

title: Works fine
body: Item worked fine. Fully charged it and it was good to go. Used on Playstation 4

title: No longer charges
body: I got this ages ago and it no longer charges

title: Exactly the same as the one you broke, probably
body: I got this to replace a DualShock 4 Controller that broke. This was, indeed, a DualShock 4 Controller. It worked fine. After a while it, too, will probably break. Then I'll get a new one. And so life goes on.Ideally, though, Sony would get whoever actually makes them to build them in such a way that they break less.

title: Replace this for free surely ??
body: Not doing too well as it presses up by itself and drains its own battery doing so 🤯🤯🤯🤯

title: Awful
body: Stickbdrift within a few weeks. Unusable within a few months.
